title: Open Thread 106.5
summary:
Key ideas:
- The adversarial collaboration contest received submissions from two teams, and the deadline has been extended.
- James Koppel's programmer coaching is being advertised on the sidebar.
- Some comments are being caught in the spam filter and may require patience from readers.
- The author acknowledges some good comments and posts relating to value differences.

Key learnings:
- The author is willing to extend deadlines to accommodate participants.
- The author is willing to advertise relevant content on their blog.
- The author is aware of issues with the spam filter and apologizes for any inconvenience to readers.
- The author values constructive comments and posts from their readers.

Key questions:
- None. (The author does not pose any key questions in this post.)
